髎字的基本解释

髎
liáo
髋骨。
骨的空隙处。
骨空间的穴位，数目较多。

髎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》落蕭切，平蕭，來。］
［《廣韻》力昭切，平宵，來。］
(1)骨节的空隙处。
(2)骨空间的穴位。
(3)尻骨。

髎字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【骨字部】　髎； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1450第40
【廣韻】落蕭切【集韻】憐蕭切，?音聊。【玉篇】髖也。【方書】章門下八寸監骨上陷中，爲居髎。缺盆中上毖骨際陷中央，爲天髎。【類篇】一曰馬胯上骨爲八髎。　又【廣韻】力昭切【集韻】離昭切，?音燎。又【集韻】力交切，音寥。又力弔切，音嫽。義?同。

Liu
liáo
Hip bone.
The voids in the bones.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Guangyun" falls off Xiaoqie, Pingxiao, come. ]
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, and at night, come. ]
(1) The gap between the condyles.
(2) Acupuncture points in bone space.
(3) Bone.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Haiji 1] [Bone Character Department] 　髎; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1450 40
[Guang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] Pity and Xiaoqie, chat with voice. [Jade articles] Hip also. [Fangshu] The bones of the eight-inch prison under the Zhangmen are sunken in the upper part, which is the Julien. The center of the middle-upper pelvic bone depression in the pelvis is Tianliu. 【Classes】Firstly, the upper bone of the horse's hip is the eight scorpions.　[Guangyun] Li Zhaoqie [Jiyun] Li Zhaoqie,? Yin Liao. Also 【Jiyun】The force is cut, and the sound is very few. And force to hang and cut, sound 嫽. Righteous? Same.
